about_the_game:
Dive into a chaotic landscape where driving, drifting, and shooting collide in a race for control over the lands. Customize your vehicles with different guns and an array of upgrades, including Turbo Chargers, Superchargers, and Armor Upgrades, to gain the edge over your opponents. Utilize unique tools like the Grapple Winche, Oil Slicks, and Rust Seekers to outmaneuver rivals and control combat situations.

Engage in intense battles against 5 bosses and collect 16 different vehicles as you progress. With RPG-like elements, you collect experience points and level up your driver, making them more skillful over time.

Protect convoys! Take on jobs to earn currency! Clean up the nomads! Prove yourself a Rust Runner!

short_description: A fusion of driving, shooting and exploration. Customize 16 vehicles with guns, upgrades and armor. Use tools like the grapple winche and oil slicks to outmaneuver rivals. Battle 5 bosses, and level up your driver. Experience the ultimate blend of combat and exploration with a hint of nostalgia.
